textAfterTable: 9 in Bangladesh   Detailed description   Download .zip .tar.gz   Install with Composer   This class can be used to create sub-domains for hosting accounts managed by cPanel. It can access the cPanel administration Web interface pages on behalf of an administrator user. The class accesses the cPanel page for adding a sub-domain for a given root domain.
